name: movement.
description:
I wrote it in a state of extreme thirst for the movement of life. My painting is filled with different symbols. The painting shows women's legs, which extend to the central element of the picture - a futuristic spinning top. My artwork is "movement." which is an indicator of the modern world through the prism of a woman.
The female legs in the picture symbolize an emancipated woman who has her rights in society and strives for self-realization. And at the same time, she remains just as feminine and beautiful. She does what she loves to do, she has every opportunity to do so, all the doors are open. The spinning top I depicted in the center of the painting symbolizes movement, modern life. This is the present and the future. And only we can influence to become better every day. My picture shows the beauty of the modern world and technology because thanks to this humanity opened many doors for self-development and the manifestation of own individuality.
